title: FS: Rare "Dark Town Battery" Bank Insert
author: Yanks23

posts.post_title: FS: Rare "Dark Town Battery" Bank Insert
posts.post_content:
Here’s a cool one that I believe came inside the package with the renowned 19th Century cast iron J. & E. Stevens Dark Town Battery Bank…the paper insert with operating instructions. Or perhaps it was used as an advertising trade card of sorts as [URL="https://robertedwardauctions.com/auction/2017/Spring/1777/circa-1880s-dark-town-battery-trade-card"]this REA auction[/URL] from 2017 suggests. 

A “must” for the collector with the mechanical bank itself. Or great as a stand-alone display item.

$450 shipped.
